        name - The Name of that Person
        profession - The Profession of that Person.

      • TheTownPeople

        public TheTownPeople(java.lang.String Name,
                     int baseHP,
                     int baseArmor,
                     int baseDmg,
                     int XP,
                     int money,
                     java.lang.String profession,
                     java.lang.String building,
                     java.lang.String goods,
                     boolean playablechar)
        This Constructor creates the People that sell goods in a City
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the People that live in that town and have a Interaction with the player.
        profession - The Profession of the People living in the Town.
        building - The Building that the People they have.
        goods - The Goods that the People sells.
